name: Enyi Tang
content: 软件学院 Enyi Tang Associate Professor PhD Supervisor 电话：(+86) 25-83621360 邮箱： 地址：Software Institute of Nanjing University, Nanjing, Jiangsu, China 办公地址：Room 913, Feiyiming Building 邮编：210093 Research My research interests span numerical system, program analysis, software testing, and AI infrastructure. Now I focus my research on improve software reliability and programming productivity with both the traditional and intelligent techniques. Major Grants National Science Foundation of China (General Program), 62172210, Principal Investigator National Science Foundation of China (General Program), 61772260, Principal Investigator National Science Foundation of China (Youth Fund), 61402222, Principal Investigator Open Foundation of State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology in Nanjing University, ZZKT2016B11, Principal Investigator Open Foundation of State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology in Nanjing University, ZZKT2014B06, Principal Investigator Open Foundation of State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology in Nanjing University, ZZKT2013B09, Principal Investigator National 863 High-Tech Programme of China, 2011AA010103, Participant Selected Publications Shuoxiao Zhang, Enyi Tang*, Haoliang Cheng, Xinyu Gao, An Guo, Jianhua Zhao, Xin Chen, Linzhang Wang, Na Meng, and Xuandong Li.
